item.description:
We will meet at the Starbucks within the Target Store

Around 5:15 or 5:30

We might go to the 3rd Floor to buy

Movie tickets and then come back

to continue our coffee.

Westfield Conn Post Mall

1201 Boston Post Road, Milford, CT 06460

http://www.westfield.com/connecticutpost

www.westfield.com/connecticutpost

Store: Pad 4A

http://www.westfield.com/us/retailers/us-starbucks/connecticutpost

www.westfield.com/us/retailers/us-starbucks/connecticutpost

What ever time that it is playing around 7 p.m we will go to see

"Lincoln"

As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443272/

www.imdb.com/title/tt0443272/

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lincoln_(2012_film)

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lincoln_(2012_film)

The previous movie planned for this day

"Bad Kids go to Hell" is not in the local area.

The closest that it is playing is in Long Island and

that it too far to go see a movie.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my Purple Back Pack. I will contact those who RSVP Yes.
item.name: Coffee Talk@ Ct Post Mall Starbucks in Target & Lincoln
